Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Reroute at Foster/Western
ShortDescription: #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Foster, Western, Lawrence, Damen, then resume their normal route.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Foster, Western, Lawrence, Damen,  then resume their normal route, due to police activity at Foster/Western.

Allow extra travel time.
